languages.text: Милостью Императора выработка прометия будет возобновлена и продолжится до самого часа, когда гравитационная хватка пустоты сорвет Гордость Сантиэля с орбитальной траектории и казнит ее в холодных объятьях тьмы.

traits.locale_text: Милостью Императора выработка прометиума будет возобновлена и продолжится до самого часа, когда гравитационная хватка Пустоты сорвет Гордость Сантиэля с орбитальной траектории и казнит ее в холодных объятьях тьмы.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.
languages.original_text: Милостью Императора выработка прометия будет возобновлена и продолжится до самого часа, когда гравитационная хватка пустоты сорвет Гордость Сантиэля с орбитальной траектории и казнит ее в холодных объятьях тьмы.

traits.locale_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void will tear Santiel's Pride from its orbit and execute it in the cold embrace of darkness.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void will tear Santiel's Pride from its orbit and execute it in the cold embrace of darkness.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: Par la grâce de l'Empereur, la production de prométhium reprendra et continuera jusqu'au jour où l'emprise gravitationnelle du vide arrachera la Gloire de Santiel à son orbite, la condamnant à périr dans les ténèbres glaciales.
languages.original_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Par la grâce de l'Empereur, la production de prométhium reprendra et continuera jusqu'au jour où l'emprise gravitationnelle du vide arrachera la Gloire de Santiel à son orbite, la condamnant à périr dans les ténèbres glaciales.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 在帝皇的仁慈之下，这个世界重新开始生产钷素。直到虚空的引力将桑提尔之傲从其轨道上撕裂，将其拥入黑暗冰冷的怀抱之中，一切才会停止。
languages.original_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.

traits.locale_text: 在帝皇的仁慈之下，这个世界重新开始生产钷素。直到虚空的引力将桑提尔之傲从其轨道上撕裂，将其拥入黑暗冰冷的怀抱之中，一切才会停止。
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: Durch die Gnade des Imperators wird die Promethium-Produktion fortgesetzt, bis die Anziehungskraft der Leere Santiels Stolz aus seinem Orbit reißt und damit der kalten Umarmung der Dunkelheit überlässt.
languages.original_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Durch die Gnade des Imperators wird die Promethium-Produktion fortgesetzt, bis die Anziehungskraft der Leere Santiels Stolz aus seinem Orbit reißt und damit der kalten Umarmung der Dunkelheit überlässt.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: Con la benevolencia del Emperador, la producción de prometio se reanudará y continuará hasta que la fuerza gravitatoria del vacío acabe separando a Orgullo de Santiel de su órbita. Así, acabará condenado a la implacable oscuridad.
languages.original_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.

traits.locale_text: Con la benevolencia del Emperador, la producción de prometio se reanudará y continuará hasta que la fuerza gravitatoria del vacío acabe separando a Orgullo de Santiel de su órbita. Así, acabará condenado a la implacable oscuridad.
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 皇帝のお慈悲で、プロメチウムの生産が再開された。虚空の重力がサンティエル・プライドを軌道から引き離して、闇の冷たい抱擁に裁かれるその瞬間まで稼働し続けるだろう。
languages.original_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝のお慈悲で、プロメチウムの生産が再開された。虚空の重力がサンティエル・プライドを軌道から引き離して、闇の冷たい抱擁に裁かれるその瞬間まで稼働し続けるだろう。
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: İmparator'un merhametiyle prometyum üretimi devam edecek ve uçsuzun çekim kuvvetinin Santiel'in Gururu'nu yörüngesinden çıkacağı ve onu karanlığın soğuk kucağına mahkûm edeceği son ana dek sürecek.
languages.original_text: By the mercy of the Emperor, the production of promethium will be resumed and will continue until the very hour when the gravitational grip of the void tears Santiel's Pride from its orbit, sentencing it to the cold embrace of darkness.
